1.1.1 (12/7/2020)

2.0.0 (5/8/2020)
--------------------------------
- Formatter changed
- New classes to represent delta, date, time and datetime objects
- as_dict changed to as_string

2.0.1 (5/8/2020)
--------------------------------
- BetterDatetime class bug fix

2.0.3 (5/8/2020)

2.0.4 (5/8/2020)
